message: Let's make a deal. Take this generous offer and avoid further devaluation of your share.
Let's meet in the middle, I won't get a worse deal than this due to inflation.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure and devaluation.
I'd rather walk away than take an unfair deal. Meet me closer to the middle.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it before inflation eats away even more of your potential gains.
